channel.title: Richard Hudson
channel.description: Richard Hudson Republican Candidate for Congress, Eighth District of North Carolina (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: I'm Richard Hudson, running for Congress in North Carolina.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: In NC we tell the truth.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: The truth is you can't support open-ended bailouts and giveaways if you want to create jobs.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: You can't support Obamacare and say you're saving Medicare.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: And you cannot support Barack Obama if you want to stop the spending, stop the waste and stop the assault on our values.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: This election is about real people ­ people who are suffering under the policies of President Obama and his friends like Larry Kissell.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: It's about the woman in Thomasville who told me she has to support two men at home ­ her husband who was laid off and her recent college graduate son who can't find a job.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: And it's about the home builder in Monroe who will take any kind of work just to avoid laying off any more employees.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: The people of NC are suffering under President Obama.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: It's not just time for a change ­ it's time for the great American comeback!
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: I give you my word, I will fight every day for what's right. Because it's not about politics, it's about people. It's about our future.
item.author: Richard Hudson

item.title: Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan are right for America. Obama and Biden are just wrong! Thank you. God bless you. God bless America.
item.author: Richard Hudson
